title: Mr. Gravure
sinopse:
Shinya Ioroi is known as the playboy photographer who will do anything to get a good photograph. He is in charge of the gravure models from Kotarou Tamaki's publication, who is an outgoing manga editor. This is a battle between two semes who are both mature experts in love.

"Being captured through this lens makes you want to be fucked, right?"

(Source: Exiled Rebels Scans)
